survey_name: Home Office Setup and Productivity Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to understand how employees set up their home offices and how these setups impact their productivity and comfort.

questions.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work from home?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. Ensure options cover the full range of possible work-from-home frequencies.

script.question_text: How many days per week do you typically work from home?

questions.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you have? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-choice selection. Include an option for respondents who may not have any dedicated equipment.

script.question_text: Which of the following home office equipment do you have? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement. Ensure the scale is balanced and includes a neutral option.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with your current home office setup?

questions.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when working from home?
answer_options: Difficulty separating work and personal life
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses. This helps capture unique challenges not listed.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: What is the biggest challenge you face when working from home?
answer_options: Difficulty separating work and personal life

questions.question_text: Please specify your biggest challenge if you selected 'Other' in the previous question.
questions.routing_logic: Only if Q4 answer is 'Other (please specify)'
questions.client_notes: This is an open-ended follow-up to Q4. Ensure it only appears for respondents who selected 'Other'.

script.question_text: Please specify your biggest challenge if you selected 'Other' in the previous question.
script.routing_logic: Only if Q4 answer is 'Other (please specify)'

questions.question_text: How often do you take breaks during your workday at home?
questions.client_notes: Use a radio button for single-choice selection. This helps assess work habits and potential burnout risks.

script.question_text: How often do you take breaks during your workday at home?

questions.question_text: Which of the following best describes your home workspace?
answer_options: A dedicated room used only as an office
A shared room (e.g., living room, bedroom) with a designated workspace
No designated workspace; I work from various locations at home
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional responses. This helps capture unique workspace setups.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with an open-text option for 'Other' (SINGLE_CHOICE with conditional OPEN_TEXT)

script.question_text: Which of the following best describes your home workspace?
answer_options: A dedicated room used only as an office
A shared room (e.g., living room, bedroom) with a designated workspace
No designated workspace; I work from various locations at home

questions.question_text: Please describe your home workspace if you selected 'Other' in the previous question.
questions.routing_logic: Only if Q7 answer is 'Other (please specify)'
questions.client_notes: This is an open-ended follow-up to Q7. Ensure it only appears for respondents who selected 'Other'.

script.question_text: Please describe your home workspace if you selected 'Other' in the previous question.
script.routing_logic: Only if Q7 answer is 'Other (please specify)'

questions.question_text: How has your productivity changed since working from home?
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure perceived productivity changes. This helps assess the overall impact of remote work.

script.question_text: How has your productivity changed since working from home?

questions.question_text: What additional equipment or resources would improve your home office setup?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback on potential improvements.

script.question_text: What additional equipment or resources would improve your home office setup?
